name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, Lao Dongyan posted on WeChat Moments: "Some departments are really despicable. I have returned to China, you can come to me directly, don't spread rumors online, and don't sell them on your own system." At the same time, searching for "Lao Dongyan" on Weibo currently only shows content before July 31.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Qingdao, Shandong. A college student was stopped by an old man with a red armband while selling small toys on the roadside. “Do I need to explain to you? Who do you think you are?” The videographer: Someone asked me to delete the video because they were afraid it would affect the city’s image.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of August 16, the first trial of the case in which a 9-year-old girl in Changsha was hit on the head by a teacher with a triangle board was held. The teacher involved, Song Yuming, was prosecuted for intentional injury. On the same day, the child's mother posted a video saying that she would do her best to fight for justice for her daughter! The daughter also said, "I hope the police uncle can arrest him and stop hurting other students."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Doctors remove foreign body from girl's skull

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Liuzhou, Guangxi. A 13-year-old boy on Beique Road was reported online to be tied to the neck with an iron chain by a man who claimed to be his father and dragged on the road. In the video, the man rode an electric bike and tied the child's neck with an iron chain. The boy ran barefoot and almost fell. Passersby stopped him and called the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The girl's mother recounted the cause of the incident in an interview earlier.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, it was reported online that Zheng Zhiying, chairman of Handan Bank, was murdered that day by a fired bank employee (branch president). Police report: The suspect was detained on the spot by the public security organ, and the case is under further investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Nan Fang Daily reporter Zhu Xiaolong made a sharp comment on world diving champion Quan Hongchan: "You are crazy showing off your gold medal to foreign athletes. You will be like an idiot after you stop diving." This caused dissatisfaction and boycott among netizens. It is said that after the incident fermented, Zhu Xiaolong cancelled his Weibo account. Nan Fang Media Group also issued a statement: it will deal with the relevant persons in charge seriously according to the facts and in accordance with the rules and disciplines. However, some people hold different views on this. A well-known lawyer believes that as a public figure, it is normal for all sectors of society to pay attention to and comment on Quan Hongchan. Zhu Xiaolong's remarks are not malicious. Athletes must always integrate into society and support themselves. It is understandable that reporters care about the future of athletes. In the specific context, it is not slander.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, the topic #Any party can withdraw during the divorce cooling-off period# became a hot search. According to the draft, "Within 30 days from the date of divorce registration application, if either party does not want to divorce, they can withdraw the divorce registration application to the marriage registration authority." This triggered a boycott from netizens, and some people called on everyone to write their opinions on the Ministry of Civil Affairs official website.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger initiated a poll, "Can the abolition of the household registration book for marriage registration fundamentally increase the marriage rate?" As of now, 75,000 people have voted "No"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, a netizen reported that students were beaten at the Xin Bashu Special Training School in Xindu District, Chengdu, and some even pretended to be police officers. According to a video posted by a netizen, he recently went undercover to investigate the Xin Bashu Special Training School. The school staff pretended to be police officers and took him back to school. On the 13th, he was beaten by the school instructor, and many children in the school were beaten.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After Hong Kong Security Secretary Chris Tang Ping-keung criticized some media supplement columnists for frequently publishing biased articles, Ming Pao Editor-in-Chief Liu Songyang wrote to the columnists of the newspaper's supplement "Times", urging them to "know their limits" and "otherwise there is no guarantee that a crisis will come one day."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning, the First Affiliated Hospital of Zhengzhou University was crowded with patients' families sleeping on the floor.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a traffic policeman from Fujian resigned and went to Russia to join the army.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, Tongxiang, Zhejiang. According to Sohu News: A woman was caught stealing new shoes worth 255 yuan from the Hongxing Erke store. The woman said that she was moved by Hongxing Erke's donation and wanted to support domestic products that day. She liked this pair of shoes but thought they were too expensive, so she took advantage of the clerk's inattention and wore them away.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, the author of the open source project Aria on GitHub announced that he was scammed because Aria's open source code was cited by scammers, which led to his being scammed across provinces. Therefore, all the project source codes were deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Hunan. A man posted a video saying that he was detained in a town hospital by the police for no reason.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 16, the U.S. Embassy in China said that they contacted the English version of the Global Times regarding a false report that falsely accused the U.S. Embassy in China of color-correcting a photo of an Olympic swimmer, and said that the article had been removed. 
The Global Times then forwarded the U.S. Embassy's Weibo and said that the article had not been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The English version of the Global Times reposted the US Embassy's Weibo and attached a link to the article, indicating that the article had not been removed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Economist Shao Yu pointed out at the 2024 Boao Real Estate Forum that "When I entered the industry, I started defending 3,000 points. Now that I have retired, I have started defending 2,900 points. I feel that my career is a lifelong battle of defense."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 14, Lingnan Shares, which has a state-owned background, announced that the company's existing currency could no longer repay the "Lingnan Convertible Bond" and could not repay the principal and interest on time. It announced a crash.
Securities Times published an article stating that the crash of Lingnan Convertible Bond broke the "belief in the rigid redemption of state-owned assets", causing institutional investors to no longer rely on the state-owned background to make judgments when choosing, but to conduct in-depth analysis of the company's property status, industry prospects and debt repayment ability.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 14, a spokesperson for the Chinese Embassy in Japan answered reporters' questions about a Japanese politician's visit to Taiwan: The Taiwan issue is at the core of China's core interests and an insurmountable red line. If some people in Japan harbor illusions about getting involved in Taiwan and attempt to obstruct China's reunification, they must pay a heavy price for it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the Henan Provincial Prison Administration Bureau announced that it would admit candidates aged 18 and 19, sparking heated discussions. Some netizens thought it was very rare for an 18-year-old candidate to be admitted. On August 16, the authorities announced that one of the candidates was not admitted due to doubts about his date of birth, and no circumstances were found to affect the admission of the other candidate during the review process.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Report on August 15: Sunshine Private Equity collapsed! The private equity fund's 1.252 billion yuan deposit was reduced to only 86,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 15, the Ministry of Public Security announced four typical cases of "fan circles" in the sports field. Among them, two people were taken criminal compulsory measures for insulting athletes. Three people were given administrative penalties for questioning and insulting athletes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 15, Yunnan. Video shows: Several urban management officers roughly forced others into a car.
August 15, Hunan. Urban management officers dragged away the vendor's snack cart, while the vendor held on to the cart tightly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 16, Nantong, Jiangsu. The former Soviet aircraft carrier "Minsk", which had been docked in the Suxitong Park for several years, caught fire during the dismantling and renovation process. Official reports said no casualties so far.
In January this year, Nantong announced that it would build a national defense science education base with the "Minsk" as the main body

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 14, Hubei. A delivery boy with mobility problems resonated with netizens.
